name: Enterprise CRM Suite
description: Our Enterprise CRM Suite helps businesses manage customer relationships, track sales pipelines, and automate workflows. With powerful analytics and seamless integrations, streamline your entire sales process.
howToUse: Sign up and create your account
Import existing contacts or add them manually
Set up your sales pipeline stages
Connect your email and other tools
Start tracking leads and managing customer relationships
Use analytics dashboard to monitor performance

name: AI ChatBot Platform
description: Deploy AI-powered chatbots on your website, app, or social media. Our platform uses natural language processing to understand customer queries and provide instant, accurate responses 24/7.
howToUse: Create your chatbot account
Train the bot with your business data and FAQs
Customize responses and conversation flows
Integrate with your website or app using provided code
Test the chatbot with sample queries
Monitor conversations and improve responses over time

name: E-Commerce Builder Pro
description: Everything you need to start, run, and grow your online business. From product management to payment processing, inventory tracking to marketing tools - all in one platform.
howToUse: Choose a template or start from scratch
Add your products with images and descriptions
Set up payment gateways (Stripe, PayPal, etc.)
Configure shipping options and tax settings
Customize your store design and branding
Launch your store and start selling

name: Project Management Dashboard
description: Keep your projects on track with task management, time tracking, team collaboration, and real-time reporting. Perfect for agile teams and remote work environments.
howToUse: Create a new project and invite team members
Break down project into tasks and milestones
Assign tasks to team members with deadlines
Use Kanban or Gantt view to visualize progress
Track time spent on each task
Generate reports and share with stakeholders

name: Cloud Storage & Backup
description: Store, sync, and share your files securely in the cloud. With end-to-end encryption, automatic backups, and team collaboration features, your data is always safe and accessible.
howToUse: Install the desktop and mobile apps
Select folders to sync automatically
Upload files via web interface or drag-and-drop
Share files or folders with team members
Set up automatic backup schedules
Access your files from any device, anywhere

name: Analytics & Insights Pro
description: Turn data into actionable insights with our powerful analytics platform. Track user behavior, measure KPIs, create custom dashboards, and make data-driven decisions with confidence.
howToUse: Add tracking code to your website or app
Define your key performance indicators (KPIs)
Create custom dashboards for different metrics
Set up user segments for detailed analysis
Monitor real-time data and trends
Export reports or integrate with other tools via API

name: Email Marketing Automation
description: Create, send, and track email campaigns that convert. With drag-and-drop builder, automation workflows, and detailed analytics, reaching your audience has never been easier.
howToUse: Import your email list or build it with signup forms
Create email campaigns using drag-and-drop builder
Segment your audience for targeted messaging
Set up automation workflows (welcome series, drip campaigns)
Schedule or send campaigns immediately
Track opens, clicks, and conversions in real-time

name: API Gateway & Management
description: Centralize API management with our robust gateway. Control access, monitor performance, implement rate limiting, and ensure security across all your microservices.
howToUse: Deploy the gateway in your infrastructure
Register your microservices and APIs
Configure authentication and authorization rules
Set rate limits and throttling policies
Monitor API performance and usage metrics
Use developer portal to manage API documentation

name: HR & Payroll System
description: Streamline your HR operations with our all-in-one platform. Manage employee records, track attendance, process payroll, and handle leave management efficiently.
howToUse: Set up company structure and departments
Add employee profiles with all relevant information
Configure payroll settings and salary structures
Employees clock in/out for attendance tracking
Process monthly payroll with automatic calculations
Generate compliance reports and manage leave requests

name: Cybersecurity Suite
description: Comprehensive cybersecurity platform with threat detection, vulnerability scanning, firewall management, and real-time monitoring to keep your infrastructure secure.
howToUse: Install security agents on all endpoints
Configure firewall rules and policies
Run initial vulnerability scan of your infrastructure
Set up real-time threat monitoring and alerts
Review security dashboard regularly
Respond to incidents using automated workflows

name: Learning Management System
description: Build your online academy with course creation tools, student management, assessments, and certifications. Perfect for educational institutions and corporate training.
howToUse: Create your academy and customize branding
Build courses with videos, documents, and quizzes
Enroll students or allow self-registration
Students access courses via web or mobile app
Track student progress and engagement
Issue certificates upon course completion

name: IoT Device Manager
description: Manage thousands of IoT devices effortlessly. Monitor status, collect sensor data, push updates, and control devices remotely with our scalable IoT platform.
howToUse: Register your IoT devices on the platform
Configure device settings and connectivity
Set up data collection and visualization dashboards
Monitor device status and sensor data in real-time
Create alerts for specific conditions or thresholds
Push firmware updates remotely to all devices
